availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hartwell G. Harris (Hopkins County, KY, farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to M P Harris. Father of M. J. Harris, Mary A. Harris, James C. Harris, Ewen H. Harris, Presley A. Harris, Samuel F. Harris, Martha A. Harris, Margaret P. Harris, William L. Harris, and Ulysses G. Harris. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 734-5.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Nebo, p. 65A.
